Posts.Content: I hope some one can give me some advice. I have had my results today of my Oncotype test. My results show i am in the intermediate risk for recurrence. I have to decide whether to have chemo or not. If i have chemo it will reduce my risk of recurrence by about 4% - i am not sure if it is really worth it for 41/2 months of chemo. At the moment it is 14 - 17% of coming back. Any thoughts and advice would be so appreciated.
Posts.Title: Oncotype results and should I have chemo?

Posts.Content: Hi Carolyn Thankyou for responding - it really helps getting more opinions and thoughts and makes you feel that you are not alone. I think I am not going to have the chemo, although i am not 100% yet - i have my next appt. on Friday so i will need to decide then.  Again Thankyou xxx
Posts.Title: Oncotype results and should I have chemo?

Posts.Content: Squeaky, Thankyou for your response, i am thinking the same as you at the moment , its a tough decision!
Posts.Title: Oncotype results and should I have chemo?
